worklist.oneSentenceDesc: As the number of sustainable travel-data collection programs increses, we implemented countless user-requested and internal features to support the growing user base.
tasks: Face-to-face communication with users of the app to gather feedback
Redesigning and implementing a new *React* frontend version of the mobile app
Re-architecting the data model in the *Python API*
Cybersecurity: Anonymous login functionality using generated QR codes

worklist.oneSentenceDesc: To support an expanding internal Knowledge Base, we designed a new search-bar based UI and database structure to support the new features.
tasks: Designing an intuitive design for a knowledge base document searching website
Automating a document check-out process using Google Apps Script/Javascript
Meeting with users of the knowledge base to generate project requirements
Applying a *Jira*-centered agile methodology in a small 3-4 person team

worklist.oneSentenceDesc: A widely used web app made by students for students, to visualize their course schedules and plan their future semesters.
